AT.name: Adventure Island II
AT.description: Es hilft alles nichts, der hinterhältige Hexenmeister will einfach nicht aufgeben! Nachdem er Prinzessin Leilani im ersten Adventure Island entführt hatte, hat er sich nun ihre Schwester Tina geschnappt. Acht gefährliche Inseln voller Jump'n'Run-Herausforderungen musst du durchqueren, um zu deiner Liebsten zu gelangen. Mach dich bereit, Dinosaurier zu bekämpfen, Lawinen zu überleben und die Schergen des Hexenmeisters auszutricksen. Higgins wird von vier Dinosauriern unterstützt, die über Fähigkeiten an Land, im Wasser und in der Luft verfügen. Nur Master Higgins kann mit der Hilfe seiner Gefährten den Frieden auf der Insel wiederherstellen und Tina retten!

AU.name: Adventure Island II
AU.description: That Evil Witch Doctor never gives up! Not content with kidnapping Princess Leilani in the first Adventure Island, now he’s swiped her sister Tina! Eight islands of perilous platform action stand between you and your sweetheart. Prepare to battle dinosaurs, survive avalanches and outwit the Witch Doctor’s minions. Higgins is helped by four dinosaurs with abilities on land, sea and even in the air. With the help of his companions, only Master Higgins can restore peace to the island and save Tina!

LU.name: Adventure Island II
LU.description: Le sorcier maléfique n'abandonne jamais ! Après avoir kidnappé la princesse Leilani dans le premier Adventure Island, il a maintenant enlevé Tina, sa sœur! Traversez huit îles aux plateformes périlleuses pour sauver votre amoureuse. Affrontez des dinosaures, échappez à des avalanches et triomphez des sbires du sorcier maléfique ! Quatre dinosaures aideront Master Higgins sur terre, dans la mer et même dans les airs. Notre héros est le seul à pouvoir restaurer la paix sur l'île, et le dernier espoir de Tina !

ES.name: Adventure Island II
ES.description: ¡El malvado brujo nunca se rinde! No contento con haber secuestrado a la princesa Leilani en la anterior aventura, ¡ahora se ha llevado a su hermana Tina! Ocho islas llenas de plataformas y acción trepidante te separan de tu amorcito. Prepárate para luchar con dinosaurios, sobrevivir a avalanchas y burlar a los esbirros del malvado brujo. Higgins contará con la ayuda de cuatro dinosaurios con distintas habilidades en tierra, mar, e incluso aire. ¡Solo maese Higgins, con la ayuda de sus compañeros, puede devolver la paz a las islas y rescatar a Tina!

Higgins is helped by four dinosaurs with abilities on land, sea and even in the air. With the help of his companions, only Master Higgins can restore peace to the island and save Tina!

IT.name: Adventure Island II
IT.description: Quel diabolico stregone sembra proprio non arrendersi mai! Non contento di aver rapito la principessa Leilani nel primo episodio della serie, ora ha posato le sue grinfie sulla sorella Tina! Otto pericolose isole ti separano dalla dolce fanciulla in questo gioco d'azione e piattaforme. Preparati ad affrontare voraci dinosauri e a evitare pericolose valanghe, mentre cerchi di avere la meglio sulle creature al servizio del diabolico stregone. Per tua fortuna, potrai contare sull'aiuto di quattro dinosauri, ciascuno dotato di un'abilità speciale, che ti permetteranno di muoverti per terra, mare e addirittura in aria. Sfrutta l'aiuto di questi preziosi alleati per riportare la pace sull'isola e salvare Tina!

GB.name: Adventure Island II

Eight islands of perilous platform action stand between you and your sweetheart. Prepare to battle dinosaurs, survive avalanches and outwit the Witch Doctor’s minions. Higgins is helped by four dinosaurs with abilities on land, sea and even in the air. With the help of his companions, only Master Higgins can restore peace to the island and save Tina!

SK.description: That Evil Witch Doctor never gives up! Not content with kidnapping Princess Leilani in the first Adventure Island, now he’s swiped her sister Tina! Eight islands of perilous platform action stand between you and your sweetheart. Prepare to battle dinosaurs, survive avalanches and outwit the Witch Doctor’s minions. Higgins is helped by four dinosaurs with abilities on land, sea and even in the air. With the help of his companions, only Master Higgins can restore peace to the island and save Tina!

RU.name: Adventure Island II
RU.description: И когда же угомонится этот злодей Evil Witch Doctor? Как известно, в первой игре серии Adventure Island он выкрал Princess Leilani, а теперь покусился на ее сестру Tina! В платформере Adventure Island II главного героя по имени Higgins и его возлюбленную разделяют целых восемь островов. Чтобы спасти невесту, Higgins предстоит пройти испытание за испытанием: сражения с динозаврами, опасные лавины и поединки с прихвостнями Witch Doctor. Однако один в поле не воин. К счастью, у Higgins есть верные друзья — четыре динозавра. С их помощью наш герой обретает волшебные навыки, благодаря которым он ни за что не пропадет на земле, в воде и даже высоко в небе. Только Higgins способен восстановить мир на острове и спасти Тину!

RO.name: Adventure Island II
RO.description: That Evil Witch Doctor never gives up! Not content with kidnapping Princess Leilani in the first Adventure Island, now he’s swiped her sister Tina! Eight islands of perilous platform action stand between you and your sweetheart. Prepare to battle dinosaurs, survive avalanches and outwit the Witch Doctor’s minions. Higgins is helped by four dinosaurs with abilities on land, sea and even in the air. With the help of his companions, only Master Higgins can restore peace to the island and save Tina!

Eight islands of perilous platform action stand between you and your sweetheart. Prepare to battle dinosaurs, survive avalanches and outwit the Witch Doctor’s minions. Higgins is helped by four dinosaurs with abilities on land, sea and even in the air. With the help of his companions, only Master Higgins can restore peace to the island and save Tina!

PT.name: Adventure Island II
PT.description: O Evil Witch Doctor nunca desiste! Não satisfeito por ter raptado a Princess Leilani no primeiro jogo de Adventure Island, agora rapta também a sua irmã Tina! Oito ilhas repletas de plataformas e ação emocionante separam-te da tua amada. Prepara-te para enfrentares dinossauros, sobreviveres a avalanches e ludibriares os subordinados do Witch Doctor. Higgins contará com a ajuda de quatro dinossauros com habilidades em terra, no mar e até nos céus. Com a ajuda dos seus companheiros, só Master Higgins poderá devolver a paz à ilha e salvar Tina!

NL.name: Adventure Island II
NL.description: De kwaadaardige Witch Doctor geeft nooit op! Niet tevreden met de ontvoering van prinses Leilani in het eerste Adventure Island-spel, besluit hij nu haar zus Tina gevangen te nemen! Acht eilanden vol platformactie staan tussen jou en je liefje. Bereid je voor om de strijd aan te gaan met dinosauriërs, lawines te overleven en de volgelingen van de Witch Doctor te slim af te zijn. Higgins wordt geholpen door vier dinosauriërs met verschillende vaardigheden die op land, op zee, en zelfs in de lucht van pas komen. Met de hulp van zijn vrienden kan Master Higgins de rust op het eiland doen wederkeren en Tina bevrijden!

SE.name: Adventure Island II
SE.description: That Evil Witch Doctor never gives up! Not content with kidnapping Princess Leilani in the first Adventure Island, now he’s swiped her sister Tina! Eight islands of perilous platform action stand between you and your sweetheart. Prepare to battle dinosaurs, survive avalanches and outwit the Witch Doctor’s minions.
